title: mAyUranAtham anisham
sahitya:
mAyUranAtham anisham bhajAmi mAyAmayA dharaNIsham tyajAmi


anupallavi

 kEyUra hArAdyalankrta dEham kEkI pUjitAmravanagEham 
Ayur ArOgyaishvaryadam sAyujyAdi muktipradam


caraNam   Aditya kOTi prakAsham nandikEsham apramEyam abhayAmbikEsham mahEsham 
mEdinyAdi panabhUtAvakAsham mIna dhvajArim purArim vEdanuta guruguha nivAsam 
bhEdayuta vishva vilAsam mOdarUpa manO vilAsam nAdamaya nava navOllAsam
